message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $100?
Thanks for the offer, Bob, but I'm afraid $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $175.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $175 is still a little steep for me though. How about $125?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'm offering the product to you for $155.
Alice, we're getting close. I can do $135, but that's really as high as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with $135. I'm willing to meet you at $145, which is the lowest I can go.
Alice, this is my final offer.  I can do $140, but if you can't do that, I'll have to go with John.
I understand you're making a serious offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $145. I'm willing to make a small concession, so I'll meet you at $142.50.
